content.json:
# Getting Started --- This workbook enables SecOps Analysts, Threat Intelligence Professionals, and Threat Hunters to map out-of-the box Microsoft Sentinel detections coverage across MITRE ATT&CK framework.
With this workbook, analysts will be able to get insights into what out-of-the box detections are already available and can make informed decision to either onboard new datasources or enable new analytics and hunting queries to increase MITRE ATT&CK coverage or fill existing gaps. The workbook is designed into separate tabs as deascribed below. ## DataSource Statistics --- This section provides dataSources currently being populated based on Usage Table and security alerts triggered across those datasources from SecurityAlerts Table across Microsoft Sentinel workspace. ## Microsoft Sentinel Github --- This section provides breakdown of existig out-of-the box content by Detection type such as Analytics, Hunting Queries and Fusion detections as well as by MITRE ATT&CK Tactics. ## Detection Platform Services --- This section provides breakdown of built-in alerts from Microsoft suite of security products such as Azure Defender for various cloud resource types/services, Microsoft Defender for Identity (MDI), Microsoft Cloud Application Security (MCAS) and others.
These alerts can be visually represented by products as well as cloud resource types. ## MITRE ATT&CK Heatmaps --- This section provides visual Heatmaps of different MITRE ATT&CK matrix categorized by cloud Platform such as Azure, AWS, GCP as well as by Microsoft Entra ID, Office 365, Windows, Linux. In order to populate the data you can use either the Jupyter Notebook or deploy the Azure Function as instructed in the solution [ThreatAnalysis&ResponsewithMITREATT&CK](https://github.com/Azure/Azure-Sentinel/tree/master/Solutions/ThreatAnalysis%26Response) Refer Notebook : [![nbviewer](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/jupyter/design/master/logos/Badges/nbviewer_badge.svg)](https://nbviewer.jupyter.org/github/Azure/Azure-Sentinel/blob/master/Tools/MITREATT%26CK-LayerGeneration-Notebook/MITRE%20ATT%26CK%20for%20Microsoft%20Sentinel.ipynb)

## Links and Resources

- Microsoft Sentinel Github : https://github.com/Azure/Azure-Sentinel/
- Microsoft Sentinel Fusion : https://docs.microsoft.com/azure/sentinel/fusion-scenario-reference
- Microsoft Defender for Cloud: https://docs.microsoft.com/azure/security-center/alerts-reference
- Azure Identity Protection (AIP): https://docs.microsoft.com/azure/active-directory/identity-protection/concept-identity-protection-risks
- Microsoft Defender for Identity: https://docs.microsoft.com/advanced-threat-analytics/suspicious-activity-guide
- Microsoft Defender for Cloud Apps : https://docs.microsoft.com/cloud-app-security/investigate-anomaly-alerts
# ** Data Sources Available in Current Microsoft Sentinel **

content.query:
Usage 
| summarize SizeinMB = round(sum(Quantity),2) by DataType 
| sort by SizeinMB desc

content.json: # Detections Coverage in Existing Microsoft Sentinel

content.query:
SecurityAlert
| where isnotempty(ProviderName)
| summarize Count=dcount(AlertName) by ProviderName, VendorName

SecurityAlert
| where isnotempty(ProviderName)
| summarize Count=count() by ProviderName, VendorName, AlertName
| sort by ProviderName

content.json:
## MITRE ATT&CK Coverage against Microsoft Sentinel Github

# Links and Resources :
- Tactics : https://attack.mitre.org/tactics/enterprise/
- Enterprise Matrix : https://attack.mitre.org/matrices/enterprise/

content.title: Query Type Breakdown

content.query:
let SentinelGithub = (externaldata(Tactic: string, TechniqueId: string, Platform: string, DetectionType: string, DetectionService: string, DetectionId: guid, DetectionName: string, DetectionDescription: string, ConnectorId: string, DataTypes: string, Query: string, QueryFrequency: string, QueryPeriod: string, TriggerOperator: string, TriggerThreshold: real, DetectionSeverity: string, DetectionUrl: string, IngestedDate: datetime)
[@"https://raw.githubusercontent.com/microsoft/mstic/master/PublicFeeds/MITREATT%26CK/MicrosoftSentinel.csv"] with (format="csv", ignoreFirstRecord=True)
);
SentinelGithub
| where DetectionService == "Azure Sentinel Community Github"
| where isnotempty(Tactic)
| extend Tactic = iff(Tactic in ("Privilege Escalation","Privilege escalation") ,"PrivilegeEscalation",Tactic)
| extend Tactic = iff(Tactic=="Persistance","Persistence",Tactic)
| extend Tactic = iff(Tactic in ("Command and control","CommandandControl"), "CommandAndControl",Tactic)
| extend Tactic = iff(Tactic in ("Defense Evasion","Defense evasion"), "DefenseEvasion",Tactic)
| extend Tactic = iff(Tactic=="Lateral movement","LateralMovement",Tactic)
| extend Tactic = iff(Tactic=="Credential Access","CredentialAccess",Tactic)
| extend Tactic = iff(Tactic in ("IntialAccess","InitalAccess", "Initial access"),"InitialAccess",Tactic)
| where Tactic in ("InitialAccess", "Collection", "Discovery", "Execution", "Exfiltration", "LateralMovement", "Persistence", "PrivilegeEscalation", "DefenseEvasion", "CredentialAccess", "LateralMovement", "Reconnaissance", "Impact")
| summarize Count=dcount(DetectionId), make_set(DetectionName) by Tactic
| sort by Count desc
content.title: Tactic Level Breakdown

content.query:
let SentinelGithub = (externaldata(Tactic: string, TechniqueId: string, Platform: string, DetectionType: string, DetectionService: string, DetectionId: guid, DetectionName: string, DetectionDescription: string, ConnectorId: string, DataTypes: string, Query: string, QueryFrequency: string, QueryPeriod: string, TriggerOperator: string, TriggerThreshold: real, DetectionSeverity: string, DetectionUrl: string, IngestedDate: datetime)
[@"https://raw.githubusercontent.com/microsoft/mstic/master/PublicFeeds/MITREATT%26CK/MicrosoftSentinel.csv"] with (format="csv", ignoreFirstRecord=True)
);
SentinelGithub
| where DetectionService == "Azure Sentinel Community Github"
| where isnotempty(Platform)
| summarize Count=dcount(DetectionId) by Platform
| sort by Count desc
content.title: Platform Level Breakdown

content.query:
let SentinelGithub = (externaldata(Tactic: string, TechniqueId: string, Platform: string, DetectionType: string, DetectionService: string, DetectionId: guid, DetectionName: string, DetectionDescription: string, ConnectorId: string, DataTypes: string, Query: string, QueryFrequency: string, QueryPeriod: string, TriggerOperator: string, TriggerThreshold: real, DetectionSeverity: string, DetectionUrl: string, IngestedDate: datetime)
[@"https://raw.githubusercontent.com/microsoft/mstic/master/PublicFeeds/MITREATT%26CK/MicrosoftSentinel.csv"] with (format="csv", ignoreFirstRecord=True)
);
SentinelGithub
| where DetectionService == "Azure Sentinel Community Github"
| where isnotempty(Tactic) and isnotempty(Platform)
| distinct Platform, DataTypes, DetectionType, DetectionName,DetectionUrl 
| sort by Platform asc, DetectionType asc
content.title: DataSource Level Breakdown
Detections by Microsoft Services
ASC - Resource Type Breakdown
List of Alerts by Microsoft Services
